name: rehooks
title: Rehooks
description: An extension for Raycast to streamline the process of creating custom React hooks.
author: Pyr33x

commands.name: search-hooks
commands.title: Search Hooks
commands.subtitle: Rehooks
commands.description: This command will make you able to copy hooks into your clipboard

commands.name: docs
commands.title: Documentaion
commands.subtitle: Rehooks
commands.description: This command displays the available documentation routes, providing a clear overview of how to navigate and access resources

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
